docs.snippet: LEAD:  ANIMATION IN NORWALK  Eighteen prize-winning animated films are featured in the 20th Tourney of Animation to be shown at 7:30 P.M. Friday through Jan. 18 at the SoNo Cinema, 15 Washington Street, South Norwalk. A 5 P.M. matinee is scheduled...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ANIMATION IN NORWALK Eighteen prize-winning animated films are featured in the 20th Tourney of Animation to be shown at 7:30 P.M. Friday through Jan. 18 at the SoNo Cinema, 15 Washington Street, South Norwalk. A 5 P.M. matinee is scheduled on Saturday.

docs.snippet: LEAD: A NEW Yonkers government began work on an uncertain note last week, appointing an interim city manager while beginning the search for a full-time administrator and seeking a unified stand on the divisive housing desegregation issue....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A NEW Yonkers government began work on an uncertain note last week, appointing an interim city manager while beginning the search for a full-time administrator and seeking a unified stand on the divisive housing desegregation issue.

headline.main: NEW COUNCIL TAKES ITS FIRST STEPS

docs.snippet: LEAD: I WAS standing at the head of the players' ramp just before game time, having small talk with Dennis D'Agostino, one of the Knicks' publicists. The tipoff against the Phoenix Suns last Tuesday night was just a few minutes away and the Garden...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: I WAS standing at the head of the players' ramp just before game time, having small talk with Dennis D'Agostino, one of the Knicks' publicists. The tipoff against the Phoenix Suns last Tuesday night was just a few minutes away and the Garden was about two-thirds full. D'Agostino suddenly looked at his watch and then peered up at the game clock, which had counted down to zero.

headline.main: PISTOL PETE AND BIRD: DREAM TEAMMATES

byline.original: By MIKE TAIBBI; Mike Taibbi is a reporter for WCBS-TV

docs.snippet: LEAD: David Puttnam, the film producer whose credits include the Oscar winners ''Midnight Express,'' ''Chariots of Fire,'' ''The Killing Fields'' and ''The Mission,'' will receive the 1988 Eastman Second Century Award....

headline.main: David Puttnam to Get 1988 Eastman Award

docs.snippet: LEAD: Yonkers officials were reported today to have offered to settle at least part of the city's seven-year-old desegregation suit by proposing to build 10 units of public housing on each of 20 sites in white neighborhoods....
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Yonkers officials were reported today to have offered to settle at least part of the city's seven-year-old desegregation suit by proposing to build 10 units of public housing on each of 20 sites in white neighborhoods.

headline.main: Yonkers Said to Propose An Accord on Bias Suit

byline.original: By JAMES FERON, Special to the New York Times

docs.snippet: LEAD: A near-record number of feature-length films from 1987 qualified for Academy Awards consideration, missing the 1974 mark by a single entry, academy officials said today....

headline.main: 263 Movies From 1987 Are in Race for Oscars

docs.snippet: LEAD: The seaside condominium where Arturo Cruz now lives in exile is set in a gentle landscape of marinas and country clubs quite unlike his native Nicaragua. But the comfort that surrounds him has done nothing to ease his regrets....

docs.snippet: LEAD: The New Year has started with a welcome bit of hilarity in our national life. Rupert Murdoch is solemnly complaining that Congress did not play by the rules in passing legislation that may crimp his style as a press tycoon....
